column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Jasmine - Thank you for your review. Upon reading
column2: I immediately spoke to the hosts on duty and confiscated their phones. Inattentive service is wholly unacceptable
column3: and I appreciate your bringing this to my attention. I have also spoken to my servers to ensure that they are checking-in on tables consistently. Unfortunately
column5: the entire staff gets pulled in a dozen directions simultaneously
column6: but it's still no excuse for bad service.
